name: Passing Through
description:
You are playing as a genderqueer, visibly genderqueer person, navigating your everyday surroundings with the everyday people in your life. 

 The everyday people in your life can be friends, colleagues, acquaintances…whose thinking is quite binary, as far as you know. You can evade their field of vision. You can also face them with your genderqueer Identity through entering their field of vision. Currently, you are on your way to your safe space. 

You move with the arrow keys on your keyboard. 

Have fun!
